BodyName: Committee on Civil and Human Rights

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to protections for workers under the city’s human rights law
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Protections for workers under the city’s human rights law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting retaliation against individuals who request a reasonable accommodation under the city’s human rights law
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting retaliation against individuals who request a reasonable accommodation under the city’s human rights law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to protections for workers under the city’s human rights law
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Protections for workers under the city’s human rights law.
